long.ar:
If you want some time to browse online but hope to avoid a full-blown internet spiral, site blocker might be perfect for you. 

Set a time limit for distracting sites. When you reach the limit, a block goes into place. That means you still get to check your feed now and then, just not for too long or too often. 

Site blocker designed to help you stay focused on your studying, learning, and the work that matters. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet has to offer.

To use Block site, simply set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let site blocker to block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, just enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site.

If you’re a parent, you can set the password for child. Or, if you’d like to use it for yourself, have a friend or partner set it for you to help you commit.

And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you’re studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost self-control to finish a project.

⭐️Features⭐️

👉 Block sites including its subdomains
Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive.

👉 White list
Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

👉 Focus Mode
The focus mode timer feature enables you to control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your tasks into intervals followed by a short break. With ‘Focus Mode’ you can set times when to disable websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary. 

👉 Time Management
Show how many work cycles you completed during a session. You’ll be able to get all your tasks done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

👉 Password Protection
If you strart focus mode you can stop it with a passcode of your choosing, making it that bit harder to procrastinate. You can also password protect the options page to keep you from easily removing sites from your list.

👉 Unstoppable Focus Mode
Select the option to hide the pause and stop buttons in the extension settings. And you won't be able to stop blocking sites until the block time expires.

👉 Funny Blocked Page
You will now see funny images if you are trying to enter a blocked site. To do this, you need to enable this option in the site blocking settings. You will still not be able to enter the blocked site, but perhaps a funny picture will make you smile :))

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You’ll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

*Note*
To block sites in incognito mode you need to activate 'Allow run in incognito mode' checkbox  in chrome://extensions page.

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code. 
This app can also be used for parental control.

Features: 
Easy to use; 
The settings page is protected by a PIN code; 
A four-digit numeric code is used as a password for blocked websites;
Block sites in different ways depending on the day of the week and time.

Our app will simplify your life where it is possible and will protect you where it is really necessary!

A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.
***
Block Site is now on the safer manifest v2. Please report the compatibility bugs you are experiencing. You can export the current rules to a JSON file and send it to me to investigate.
***

This extension will block access to websites of your choosing. A master password controls all customization options, as well as access to any blocked site. It's also possible to redirect navigation from one specific website to another. 


Features:
1. Block unwanted domains. 
2. Prevent access to a range of websites using wildcard matching or regular expression matching.
3. Reverse mode allows access to only some hostnames and blocks access to all others. 
4. Custom redirection; you can redirect a single blocked hostname to a new destination. 
5. Display a custom message on blocked pages.
6. Time and date-based blocking. Only block access to the websites at specified times and dates. This feature can be configured per hostname. 
7. Protect data leakage. This extension prevents certain hostnames from gathering network activity from your computer since blocking occurs before any network request is emitted to the server.
8. Auto-closes blocked tabs after some time.
10. Closes annoying pop-ups as soon as the opening request is received.
11. Pause and resume blocking from the right-click context menu of the toolbar button.
12. Support overwriting configurations by managed storage
13. Block cached page load with service worker
14. Block dynamic page change with history push method

Easily block websites of your choice!
Block Site is a browser addon to help you block desired websites. To operate, simply right-click on any webpage and then click on the "Block this website" context-menu item. The website will be added to the block list. Please note, the whole domain will be added to the block list, not just a URL. To change this list, open the options page, and remove the desired item.
Website blocker, Ad blocker, Content filter, Productivity, Focus, Time management, Distraction-free, Parental control, Internet safety, Addiction prevention, Website blocking, URL blocker, Domain blocker, Online security, Digital wellbeing, Cybersecurity, Internet censorship, Digital detox, Screen time control, Time limit.

For any blocked domain, you can add a redirect URL in the options page. So instead of blocking a page, the website will be redirected to the desired URL. There is also an option to block desired iframes. To do so, please add the URL (for the iframe) in the designated area on the options page.

Protect your time and experience by blocking waste websites.
Block unwanted or malicious web sites permanently or on a schedule. Save your time and protect against visiting unwanted web resources.

Block Site hides unwanted websites from you and protects your children from visiting them.

Configure the application to block domains permanently or on a schedule. 
Choose working days and hours when you do not want to visit any domain or working days and hours for all blocked domains.

Block Site is an advanced application for blocking inappropriate content. Useful features of the application:
- Blocking sites for one or more domain names
- Blocking sites by keywords
- Setting a schedule for blocking content
- Create a white list of domains

Try our software now. Its 100% free to use.

Block access to any site on your device
Save your time, protect yourself and improve your browsing experience with absolutely free site blocker. This extension allows you to block certain websites. It pretty useful if you want to protect your children or just if you want to shield yourself from inappropriate content. Block website you want just in a few clicks. Site blocker may also come in handy if you don`t want to be annoyed by a certain website. In that case you just block site and forget about it. The extension is a real productivity tool that denies access to websites you don`t want to see.
Surf the internet safely!

Website blocker, Ad blocker, Content filter, Productivity, Focus, Time management, Distraction-free, Parental control, Internet safety, Addiction prevention, Website blocking, URL blocker, Domain blocker, Online security, Digital wellbeing, Cybersecurity, Internet censorship, Digital detox, Screen time control, Time limit.

Block website and keep working on your main tasks without being distracted. Click on the extension icon in the right upper corner of the chrome and open the app. Then you just paste the website address into the corresponding field and block site. You can also instantly use the url from the current chrome tab. Removing a website from the list is also pretty easy – one click and done. This new site blocker extension is pretty simple but pretty useful app. Focus on what matters most and don`t get distracted. This extension is going to help you increasing your productivity at workplace. Easy to install, easy to use and absolutely free extension specially for you!

If you want some time to browse online but hope to avoid a full-blown internet spiral, site blocker might be perfect for you. 

Set a time limit for distracting sites. When you reach the limit, a block goes into place. That means you still get to check your feed now and then, just not for too long or too often. 

Site blocker designed to help you stay focused on your studying, learning, and the work that matters. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet has to offer.

To use Block site, simply set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let site blocker to block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, just enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site.

If you’re a parent, you can set the password for child. Or, if you’d like to use it for yourself, have a friend or partner set it for you to help you commit.

And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you’re studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost self-control to finish a project.

⭐️Features⭐️

👉 Block sites including its subdomains
Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive.

👉 White list
Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

👉 Focus Mode
The focus mode timer feature enables you to control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your tasks into intervals followed by a short break. With ‘Focus Mode’ you can set times when to disable websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary. 

👉 Time Management
Show how many work cycles you completed during a session. You’ll be able to get all your tasks done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

👉 Password Protection
If you strart focus mode you can stop it with a passcode of your choosing, making it that bit harder to procrastinate. You can also password protect the options page to keep you from easily removing sites from your list.

👉 Unstoppable Focus Mode
Select the option to hide the pause and stop buttons in the extension settings. And you won't be able to stop blocking sites until the block time expires.

👉 Funny Blocked Page
You will now see funny images if you are trying to enter a blocked site. To do this, you need to enable this option in the site blocking settings. You will still not be able to enter the blocked site, but perhaps a funny picture will make you smile :))

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You’ll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

*Note*
To block sites in incognito mode you need to activate 'Allow run in incognito mode' checkbox  in chrome://extensions page.

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code. 
This app can also be used for parental control.

Features: 
Easy to use; 
The settings page is protected by a PIN code; 
A four-digit numeric code is used as a password for blocked websites;
Block sites in different ways depending on the day of the week and time.

Our app will simplify your life where it is possible and will protect you where it is really necessary!

A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.
***
Block Site is now on the safer manifest v2. Please report the compatibility bugs you are experiencing. You can export the current rules to a JSON file and send it to me to investigate.
***

This extension will block access to websites of your choosing. A master password controls all customization options, as well as access to any blocked site. It's also possible to redirect navigation from one specific website to another. 


Features:
1. Block unwanted domains. 
2. Prevent access to a range of websites using wildcard matching or regular expression matching.
3. Reverse mode allows access to only some hostnames and blocks access to all others. 
4. Custom redirection; you can redirect a single blocked hostname to a new destination. 
5. Display a custom message on blocked pages.
6. Time and date-based blocking. Only block access to the websites at specified times and dates. This feature can be configured per hostname. 
7. Protect data leakage. This extension prevents certain hostnames from gathering network activity from your computer since blocking occurs before any network request is emitted to the server.
8. Auto-closes blocked tabs after some time.
10. Closes annoying pop-ups as soon as the opening request is received.
11. Pause and resume blocking from the right-click context menu of the toolbar button.
12. Support overwriting configurations by managed storage
13. Block cached page load with service worker
14. Block dynamic page change with history push method

Easily block websites of your choice!
Block Site is a browser addon to help you block desired websites. To operate, simply right-click on any webpage and then click on the "Block this website" context-menu item. The website will be added to the block list. Please note, the whole domain will be added to the block list, not just a URL. To change this list, open the options page, and remove the desired item.

For any blocked domain, you can add a redirect URL in the options page. So instead of blocking a page, the website will be redirected to the desired URL. There is also an option to block desired iframes. To do so, please add the URL (for the iframe) in the designated area on the options page.

Protect your time and experience by blocking waste websites.
Block unwanted or malicious web sites permanently or on a schedule. Save your time and protect against visiting unwanted web resources.

Block Site hides unwanted websites from you and protects your children from visiting them.

Configure the application to block domains permanently or on a schedule. 
Choose working days and hours when you do not want to visit any domain or working days and hours for all blocked domains.

Block Site is an advanced application for blocking inappropriate content. Useful features of the application:
- Blocking sites for one or more domain names
- Blocking sites by keywords
- Setting a schedule for blocking content
- Create a white list of domains

Try our software now. Its 100% free to use.

Block access to any site on your device
Save your time, protect yourself and improve your browsing experience with absolutely free site blocker. This extension allows you to block certain websites. It pretty useful if you want to protect your children or just if you want to shield yourself from inappropriate content. Block website you want just in a few clicks. Site blocker may also come in handy if you don`t want to be annoyed by a certain website. In that case you just block site and forget about it. The extension is a real productivity tool that denies access to websites you don`t want to see.
Surf the internet safely!
Block website and keep working on your main tasks without being distracted. Click on the extension icon in the right upper corner of the chrome and open the app. Then you just paste the website address into the corresponding field and block site. You can also instantly use the url from the current chrome tab. Removing a website from the list is also pretty easy – one click and done. This new site blocker extension is pretty simple but pretty useful app. Focus on what matters most and don`t get distracted. This extension is going to help you increasing your productivity at workplace. Easy to install, easy to use and absolutely free extension specially for you!

long.ca:
Si voleu una estona per navegar en línia, però espereu evitar una espiral d'Internet en tota regla, el bloquejador de llocs pot ser perfecte per a vosaltres.

Estableix un límit de temps per als llocs de distracció. Quan arribeu al límit, un bloc entra al seu lloc. Això vol dir que encara podeu comprovar el vostre feed de tant en tant, però no durant massa temps ni massa sovint.

Bloquejador de llocs dissenyat per ajudar-vos a centrar-vos en el vostre estudi, aprenentatge i la feina que importa. Bloqueja tots els llocs web amb temps per mantenir-te productiu i allunyat de totes les distraccions que ofereix Internet.

Per utilitzar el lloc de bloqueig, només cal que configureu una contrasenya, decidiu a quins llocs web voleu accedir i deixeu que el bloquejador de llocs bloquegi la resta. Si voleu visitar un lloc que heu bloquejat, només heu d'introduir la vostra contrasenya i decidir quant de temps voleu estar al lloc bloquejat.

Si sou pares, podeu definir la contrasenya per al nen. O, si voleu utilitzar-lo per a vosaltres mateixos, feu que un amic o una parella us el configuren perquè us ajudi a comprometre's.

I voilà! Ara teniu un conjunt de baranes d'Internet que us ajuden a mantenir-vos productiu i treballant tant si esteu estudiant, aprenent a distància o necessiteu un impuls addicional d'autocontrol per acabar un projecte.

⭐️Característiques⭐️

👉 Bloqueja llocs inclosos els seus subdominis
Elimina tots els llocs web que distreuen i nocius de la teva vida bloquejant-los per tu mentre necessites mantenir-te concentrat i productiu.

👉 Llista blanca
Afegiu excepcions a la llista de llocs web bloquejats. Els llocs d'aquesta llista eviten totes les configuracions de bloqueig.

👉 Mode d'enfocament
La funció de temporitzador del mode d'enfocament us permet controlar la vostra programació mitjançant el temporitzador de la tècnica Pomodoro. Dividiu les vostres tasques en intervals seguits d'una breu pausa. Amb el "Mode d'enfocament" podeu establir les hores en què desactivar els llocs web i quan navegar lliurement, sense necessitat de força de voluntat.

👉 Gestió del temps
Mostra quants cicles de treball has completat durant una sessió. Podreu fer totes les vostres tasques i encara tindreu temps per navegar pels vostres llocs i aplicacions preferides.

👉 Protecció amb contrasenya
Si inicieu el mode d'enfocament, podeu aturar-lo amb una contrasenya de la vostra elecció, cosa que fa que sigui una mica més difícil de procrastinar. També podeu protegir la pàgina d'opcions amb contrasenya per evitar que elimineu fàcilment els llocs de la vostra llista.

👉 Mode d'enfocament imparable
Seleccioneu l'opció per amagar els botons de pausa i aturada a la configuració de l'extensió. I no podreu deixar de bloquejar llocs fins que expiri el temps de bloqueig.

👉 Divertida pàgina bloquejada
Ara veureu imatges divertides si intenteu entrar en un lloc bloquejat. Per fer-ho, heu d'activar aquesta opció a la configuració de bloqueig del lloc. Encara no podreu entrar al lloc bloquejat, però potser una imatge divertida us farà somriure :))

Block Site és una de les millors eines de productivitat disponibles per ajudar les persones a retardar menys, ser més productives i assolir els seus objectius de vida. Mai més us haureu de preocupar de com mantenir-vos concentrat a la feina. Aleshores, a què esperes? Descarrega ara i comença a prendre el control del teu temps... avui!

*Nota*
Per bloquejar llocs en mode d'incògnit, heu d'activar la casella de selecció "Permetre l'execució en mode d'incògnit" a la pàgina chrome://extensions.
long.cs:
Pokud chcete trochu času na procházení online, ale doufáte, že se vyhnete rozjeté spirále internetu, může být pro vás ideální blokování stránek.

Nastavte časový limit pro rušivé stránky. Když dosáhnete limitu, zablokuje se. To znamená, že stále můžete svůj zdroj občas zkontrolovat, jen ne příliš dlouho nebo příliš často.

Site blocker navržený tak, aby vám pomohl soustředit se na vaše studium, učení a práci, na které záleží. Blokuje všechny časově závislé webové stránky, abyste byli produktivní a daleko od všech rušivých vlivů, které internet nabízí.

Chcete-li použít blokování webu, jednoduše nastavte heslo, rozhodněte se, ke kterým webům chcete mít přístup, a nechte blokování webu blokovat zbytek. Pokud chcete navštívit web, který jste zablokovali, stačí zadat heslo a rozhodnout se, jak dlouho chcete na blokovaném webu být.

Pokud jste rodič, můžete nastavit heslo pro dítě. Nebo, pokud ji chcete použít pro sebe, požádejte přítele nebo partnera, aby vám ji nastavil, aby vám pomohl zavázat se.

A voila! Nyní máte sadu internetových zábradlí, které vám pomohou zůstat produktivní a plnit úkoly, ať už studujete, vzděláváte se na dálku nebo potřebujete další posílení sebekontroly k dokončení projektu.

⭐️Vlastnosti⭐️

👉 Blokujte weby včetně jejich subdomén
Odstraňte ze svého života všechny rušivé a škodlivé webové stránky tím, že je zablokujete, zatímco vy potřebujete zůstat soustředění a produktivní.

👉 Bílá listina
Přidejte výjimky do seznamu blokovaných webů. Weby z tohoto seznamu se vyhýbají všem nastavením blokování.

👉 Režim ostření
Funkce časovače režimu ostření vám umožňuje ovládat váš plán pomocí časovače techniky Pomodoro. Rozdělte si úkoly do intervalů, po kterých následuje krátká přestávka. Pomocí „režimu ostření“ můžete nastavit časy, kdy deaktivovat webové stránky a kdy volně procházet – není potřeba síla vůle.

👉 Time management
Ukažte, kolik pracovních cyklů jste během relace dokončili. Budete moci splnit všechny své úkoly a mezi tím budete mít stále čas procházet své oblíbené weby a aplikace.

👉 Ochrana heslem
Pokud spustíte režim ostření, můžete jej zastavit pomocí přístupového kódu dle vašeho výběru, takže je o něco těžší odkládat. Stránku s možnostmi můžete také chránit heslem, abyste mohli snadno odstranit weby ze seznamu.

👉 Nezastavitelný režim ostření
Vyberte možnost skrýt tlačítka pozastavení a zastavení v nastavení rozšíření. A nebudete moci přestat blokovat stránky, dokud nevyprší čas blokování.

👉 Vtipná zablokovaná stránka
Pokud se pokoušíte vstoupit na zablokovaný web, nyní uvidíte vtipné obrázky. Chcete-li to provést, musíte tuto možnost povolit v nastavení blokování stránek. Na zablokovanou stránku se stále nedostanete, ale snad vás vtipný obrázek vykouzlí úsměv :))

Block Site je jedním z nejlepších dostupných nástrojů produktivity, který pomáhá lidem méně odkládat, stát se produktivnějšími a dosáhnout svých životních cílů. Už se nikdy nebudete muset starat o to, jak se v práci soustředit. Tak na co čekáš? Stáhněte si nyní a začněte ovládat svůj čas... ještě dnes!

*Poznámka*
Chcete-li blokovat weby v anonymním režimu, musíte na stránce chrome://extensions aktivovat zaškrtávací políčko „Povolit spuštění v režimu inkognito“.
long.da:
Hvis du vil have lidt tid til at browse online, men håber at undgå en komplet internetspiral, kan webstedsblokering være perfekt for dig.

Indstil en tidsgrænse for distraherende websteder. Når du når grænsen, går en blok på plads. Det betyder, at du stadig kan tjekke dit feed nu og da, bare ikke for længe eller for ofte.

Siteblocker designet til at hjælpe dig med at holde fokus på dine studier, læring og det arbejde, der betyder noget. Blokerer alle tidsfordrivende websteder for at holde dig produktiv og væk fra alle de distraktioner, internettet har at byde på.

For at bruge Bloker websted skal du blot angive en adgangskode, beslutte, hvilke websteder du vil have adgang til, og lade webstedsblokering blokere resten. Hvis du vil besøge et websted, du har blokeret, skal du blot indtaste din adgangskode og beslutte, hvor længe du vil være på det blokerede websted.

Hvis du er forælder, kan du indstille adgangskoden til barnet. Eller, hvis du gerne vil bruge det til dig selv, så få en ven eller partner til at indstille det til dig for at hjælpe dig med at forpligte dig.

Og voila! Du har nu et sæt internetværn, der hjælper dig med at forblive produktiv og på opgaven, uanset om du studerer, fjernundervisning eller har brug for et ekstra boost af selvkontrol for at afslutte et projekt.

⭐️Funktioner⭐️

👉 Bloker websteder inklusive dets underdomæner
Fjern alle distraherende og skadelige websteder fra dit liv ved at blokere dem for dig, mens du skal forblive fokuseret og produktiv.

👉 Hvid liste
Tilføj undtagelser til listen over blokerede websteder. Websteder fra denne liste undgår alle blokeringsindstillinger.

👉 Fokustilstand
Fokustilstandstimerfunktionen giver dig mulighed for at styre din tidsplan via Pomodoro-tekniktimeren. Opdel dine opgaver i intervaller efterfulgt af en kort pause. Med 'Focus Mode' kan du indstille tidspunkter for, hvornår du skal deaktivere websteder, og hvornår du skal browse frit - ingen viljestyrke nødvendig.

👉 Tidsstyring
Vis, hvor mange arbejdscyklusser du gennemførte i løbet af en session. Du vil være i stand til at få alle dine opgaver løst og stadig have tid til at gennemse dine yndlingswebsteder og apps ind imellem.

👉 Adgangskodebeskyttelse
Hvis du starter fokustilstand, kan du stoppe den med en adgangskode efter eget valg, hvilket gør det lidt sværere at udsætte. Du kan også beskytte indstillingssiden med adgangskode for at forhindre dig i nemt at fjerne websteder fra din liste.

👉 Ustoppelig fokustilstand
Vælg muligheden for at skjule pause- og stopknapperne i udvidelsesindstillingerne. Og du vil ikke være i stand til at stoppe med at blokere websteder, før blokeringstiden udløber.

👉 Sjov blokeret side
Du vil nu se sjove billeder, hvis du forsøger at komme ind på et blokeret websted. For at gøre dette skal du aktivere denne mulighed i indstillingerne for webstedsblokering. Du vil stadig ikke være i stand til at komme ind på den blokerede side, men måske vil et sjovt billede få dig til at smile :))

Block Site er et af de bedste produktivitetsværktøjer til rådighed for at hjælpe folk med at udsætte mindre, blive mere produktive og nå deres livsmål. Du behøver aldrig mere at bekymre dig om, hvordan du forbliver fokuseret på arbejdet. Så hvad venter du på? Download nu og begynd at tage kontrol over din tid...i dag!

*Bemærk*
For at blokere websteder i inkognitotilstand skal du aktivere afkrydsningsfeltet "Tillad kørsel i inkognitotilstand" på siden chrome://extensions.
long.de:
Wenn Sie etwas Zeit zum Surfen im Internet haben möchten, aber hoffen, eine ausgewachsene Internetspirale zu vermeiden, ist ein Website-Blocker möglicherweise perfekt für Sie.

Legen Sie ein Zeitlimit für ablenkende Websites fest. Wenn Sie das Limit erreichen, tritt eine Sperre ein. Das bedeutet, dass Sie Ihren Feed immer noch ab und zu überprüfen können, nur nicht zu lange oder zu oft.

Website-Blocker, der Ihnen helfen soll, sich auf Ihr Studium, Lernen und die Arbeit zu konzentrieren, die wichtig ist. Blockiert alle zeitkritischen Websites, damit Sie produktiv bleiben und sich von allen Ablenkungen fernhalten, die das Internet zu bieten hat.

Um die Block-Site zu verwenden, legen Sie einfach ein Passwort fest, entscheiden Sie, auf welche Websites Sie zugreifen möchten, und lassen Sie den Site-Blocker den Rest blockieren. Wenn Sie eine von Ihnen blockierte Website besuchen möchten, geben Sie einfach Ihr Passwort ein und entscheiden Sie, wie lange Sie auf der blockierten Website bleiben möchten.

Wenn Sie ein Elternteil sind, können Sie das Passwort für Ihr Kind festlegen. Oder, wenn Sie es für sich selbst verwenden möchten, lassen Sie es von einem Freund oder Partner für Sie einrichten, damit er Ihnen beim Commitment hilft.

Und voila! Sie haben jetzt eine Reihe von Internet-Leitplanken, die Ihnen dabei helfen, produktiv und bei der Arbeit zu bleiben, egal ob Sie studieren, Fernlernen oder einen zusätzlichen Schub an Selbstbeherrschung benötigen, um ein Projekt abzuschließen.

⭐️Eigenschaften⭐️

👉 Blockieren Sie Websites einschließlich ihrer Subdomains
Entfernen Sie alle ablenkenden und schädlichen Websites aus Ihrem Leben, indem Sie sie für Sie blockieren, während Sie konzentriert und produktiv bleiben müssen.

👉 Weiße Liste
Fügen Sie der Liste der blockierten Websites Ausnahmen hinzu. Websites aus dieser Liste vermeiden alle Blockierungseinstellungen.

👉 Fokusmodus
Mit der Fokusmodus-Timerfunktion können Sie Ihren Zeitplan über den Pomodoro-Technik-Timer steuern. Teilen Sie Ihre Aufgaben in Intervalle auf, gefolgt von einer kurzen Pause. Mit dem „Fokusmodus“ können Sie Zeiten festlegen, wann Websites deaktiviert und wann Sie frei surfen können – keine Willenskraft erforderlich.

👉 Zeitmanagement
Zeigen Sie an, wie viele Arbeitszyklen Sie während einer Sitzung absolviert haben. Sie können alle Ihre Aufgaben erledigen und haben zwischendurch immer noch Zeit, Ihre Lieblingsseiten und -apps zu durchsuchen.

👉 Passwortschutz
Wenn Sie den Fokusmodus starten, können Sie ihn mit einem Passcode Ihrer Wahl stoppen, was das Aufschieben etwas schwieriger macht. Sie können die Optionsseite auch mit einem Kennwort schützen, damit Sie Websites nicht einfach aus Ihrer Liste entfernen können.

👉 Unaufhaltsamer Fokusmodus
Wählen Sie die Option zum Ausblenden der Schaltflächen Pause und Stopp in den Erweiterungseinstellungen. Und Sie können das Sperren von Websites erst nach Ablauf der Sperrzeit beenden.

👉 Lustige blockierte Seite
Sie sehen jetzt lustige Bilder, wenn Sie versuchen, eine blockierte Seite zu betreten. Dazu müssen Sie diese Option in den Einstellungen zum Sperren von Websites aktivieren. Sie können die blockierte Seite immer noch nicht betreten, aber vielleicht bringt Sie ein lustiges Bild zum Lächeln :))

Block Site ist eines der besten verfügbaren Produktivitätstools, um Menschen dabei zu helfen, weniger zu zögern, produktiver zu werden und ihre Lebensziele zu erreichen. Sie müssen sich nie wieder Gedanken darüber machen, wie Sie bei der Arbeit konzentriert bleiben. Also, worauf wartest Du? Laden Sie es jetzt herunter und fangen Sie an, die Kontrolle über Ihre Zeit zu übernehmen ... heute!

*Notiz*
Um Websites im Inkognito-Modus zu blockieren, müssen Sie das Kontrollkästchen „Ausführen im Inkognito-Modus zulassen“ auf der Seite chrome://extensions aktivieren.
long.en,en_AU,es_419,pt_BR,ru,uk,zh_TW:
If you want some time to browse online but hope to avoid a full-blown internet spiral, a site blocker might be perfect for you. 
 
Set a time limit for distracting sites. When you reach the limit, a block goes into place. That means you still get to check your feed now and then, just not for too long or too often. 

Site blocker is designed to help you stay focused on studying, learning, and working. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet offers.

To use a site blocker, set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let the site blocker block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site.

If you’re a parent, you can set the password for your child. Or, if you’d like to use it yourself, have a friend or partner put it for you to help you concentrate.

And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you’re studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost of self-control to finish a project.

⭐️Features⭐️

👉 Block sites, including its subdomains
Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive.

👉 Allowlist
Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

👉 Focus mode
The focus mode timer lets you control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique. Break down your tasks into intervals followed by a short break. With ‘Focus Mode,’ you can set times to disable websites and browse freely. 

👉 Time management
Show how many work cycles you completed during a session. So you’ll be able to get all your tasks done and still have time to browse your favourite sites and apps in between.

👉 Password protection
If you start focus mode, you can stop it with a passcode of your choosing, making it harder to procrastinate. You can also password-protect the options page to keep you from efficiently removing sites from your list.

👉 Unstoppable focus mode
Select the option to hide the pause and stop buttons in the extension settings. And you won't be able to stop blocking sites until the block time expires.

👉 Funny blocked page
You will now see funny images if you are trying to enter a blocked site. To do this, you need to enable this option in the site blocking settings. You will still not be able to enter the blocked site, but perhaps a funny picture will make you smile :))

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You’ll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. 

⭐️Note⭐️
To block sites in incognito mode, you need to activate Allow run in incognito mode checkbox on the chrome://extensions page.

long.es:
Si desea algo de tiempo para navegar en línea pero espera evitar una espiral de Internet en toda regla, el bloqueador de sitios podría ser perfecto para usted.

Establezca un límite de tiempo para los sitios que distraen. Cuando llegas al límite, un bloque entra en su lugar. Eso significa que aún puedes revisar tu feed de vez en cuando, pero no por mucho tiempo ni con demasiada frecuencia.

Bloqueador de sitios diseñado para ayudarlo a mantenerse enfocado en su estudio, aprendizaje y el trabajo que importa. Bloquea todos los sitios web que pierden el tiempo para mantenerlo productivo y alejado de todas las distracciones que ofrece Internet.

Para usar Bloquear sitio, simplemente establezca una contraseña, decida a qué sitios web desea acceder y deje que el bloqueador de sitios bloquee el resto. Si desea visitar un sitio que ha bloqueado, simplemente ingrese su contraseña y decida cuánto tiempo desea estar en el sitio bloqueado.

Si es padre, puede establecer la contraseña para el niño. O, si desea usarlo usted mismo, pídale a un amigo o compañero que lo configure para ayudarlo a comprometerse.

¡Y voilá! Ahora tiene un conjunto de barandillas de Internet que lo ayudan a mantenerse productivo y concentrado, ya sea que esté estudiando, aprendiendo a distancia o necesita un autocontrol adicional para terminar un proyecto.

⭐️Características⭐️

👉 Bloquear sitios incluyendo sus subdominios
Elimine todos los sitios web dañinos y que distraen de su vida bloqueándolos mientras necesita mantenerse enfocado y productivo.

👉 Lista blanca
Agregue excepciones a la lista de sitios web bloqueados. Los sitios de esta lista evitan todas las configuraciones de bloqueo.

👉 Modo de enfoque
La función de temporizador del modo de enfoque le permite controlar su horario a través del temporizador de la técnica Pomodoro. Divide tus tareas en intervalos seguidos de un breve descanso. Con el "Modo de enfoque" puede establecer tiempos para deshabilitar sitios web y navegar libremente, sin necesidad de fuerza de voluntad.

👉 Gestión del tiempo
Muestre cuántos ciclos de trabajo completó durante una sesión. Podrá realizar todas sus tareas y aún tendrá tiempo para navegar por sus sitios y aplicaciones favoritos en el medio.

👉 Protección de contraseña
Si inicia el modo de enfoque, puede detenerlo con un código de acceso de su elección, lo que hace que sea un poco más difícil posponer las cosas. También puede proteger con contraseña la página de opciones para evitar que elimine fácilmente sitios de su lista.

👉 Modo de enfoque imparable
Seleccione la opción para ocultar los botones de pausa y parada en la configuración de la extensión. Y no podrá dejar de bloquear sitios hasta que expire el tiempo de bloqueo.

👉 Página divertida bloqueada
Ahora verá imágenes divertidas si está intentando ingresar a un sitio bloqueado. Para hacer esto, debe habilitar esta opción en la configuración de bloqueo del sitio. Aún no podrá ingresar al sitio bloqueado, pero tal vez una imagen divertida lo haga sonreír :))

Block Site es una de las mejores herramientas de productividad disponibles para ayudar a las personas a procrastinar menos, ser más productivas y alcanzar sus objetivos de vida. Nunca más tendrás que preocuparte por mantener la concentración en el trabajo. ¿Entonces, Qué esperas? Descárguelo ahora y comience a tomar el control de su tiempo... ¡hoy!

*Nota*
Para bloquear sitios en modo incógnito, debe activar la casilla de verificación 'Permitir ejecutar en modo incógnito' en la página chrome://extensions.

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code.

Easy to use;

Block sites in different ways depending on the day of the week and time.

Our app will simplify your life where it is possible and will protect you where it is really necessary!

***
Block Site is now on the safer manifest v2. Please report the compatibility bugs you are experiencing. You can export the current rules to a JSON file and send it to me to investigate.
***

This extension will block access to websites of your choosing. A master password controls all customization options, as well as access to any blocked site. It's also possible to redirect navigation from one specific website to another. 


Features:
1. Block unwanted domains. 
2. Prevent access to a range of websites using wildcard matching or regular expression matching.
3. Reverse mode allows access to only some hostnames and blocks access to all others. 
4. Custom redirection; you can redirect a single blocked hostname to a new destination. 
5. Display a custom message on blocked pages.
6. Time and date-based blocking. Only block access to the websites at specified times and dates. This feature can be configured per hostname. 
7. Protect data leakage. This extension prevents certain hostnames from gathering network activity from your computer since blocking occurs before any network request is emitted to the server.
8. Auto-closes blocked tabs after some time.
10. Closes annoying pop-ups as soon as the opening request is received.
11. Pause and resume blocking from the right-click context menu of the toolbar button.
12. Support overwriting configurations by managed storage
13. Block cached page load with service worker
14. Block dynamic page change with history push method

Easily block websites of your choice!
Block Site is a browser addon to help you block desired websites. To operate, simply right-click on any webpage and then click on the "Block this website" context-menu item. The website will be added to the block list. Please note, the whole domain will be added to the block list, not just a URL. To change this list, open the options page, and remove the desired item.

For any blocked domain, you can add a redirect URL in the options page. So instead of blocking a page, the website will be redirected to the desired URL. There is also an option to block desired iframes. To do so, please add the URL (for the iframe) in the designated area on the options page.

Protect your time and experience by blocking waste websites.
Block unwanted or malicious web sites permanently or on a schedule. Save your time and protect against visiting unwanted web resources.

Block Site hides unwanted websites from you and protects your children from visiting them.

Configure the application to block domains permanently or on a schedule. 
Choose working days and hours when you do not want to visit any domain or working days and hours for all blocked domains.

long.fi:
Jos haluat jonkin aikaa selata verkossa, mutta haluat välttää täysimittaisen Internet-spiraalin, sivuston esto voi olla täydellinen sinulle.

Aseta aikaraja häiritseville sivustoille. Kun saavutat rajan, lohko menee paikalleen. Tämä tarkoittaa, että voit silti tarkistaa syötteesi silloin tällöin, mutta et liian pitkään tai liian usein.

Sivuston estotoiminto, joka on suunniteltu auttamaan sinua keskittymään opiskeluun, oppimiseen ja tärkeään työhön. Estää kaikki aikaa vievät verkkosivustot pitääkseen sinut tuottavana ja poissa kaikista Internetin tarjoamista häiriötekijöistä.

Jos haluat käyttää Estä sivustoa, aseta salasana, päätä, mille verkkosivustoille haluat pääsyn, ja anna sivustojen estotoiminnon estää loput. Jos haluat vierailla sivustolla, jonka olet estänyt, kirjoita vain salasanasi ja päätä, kuinka kauan haluat olla estetyllä sivustolla.

Jos olet vanhempi, voit asettaa salasanan lapselle. Tai jos haluat käyttää sitä itse, pyydä ystävää tai kumppania asettamaan se sinulle auttamaan sinua sitoutumaan.

Ja voila! Sinulla on nyt joukko Internetin suojakaiteita, jotka auttavat sinua pysymään tuottavana ja tehtävien parissa riippumatta siitä, oletko opiskelemassa, etäoppimassa tai tarvitsetko lisätehostetta itsehillintääksesi projektin loppuun saattamiseksi.

⭐️Ominaisuudet⭐️

👉 Estä sivustot mukaan lukien sen aliverkkotunnukset
Poista elämästäsi kaikki häiritsevät ja haitalliset verkkosivustot estämällä ne puolestasi, kun sinun on pysyttävä keskittyneenä ja tuottavana.

👉 Valkoinen lista
Lisää poikkeuksia estettyjen verkkosivustojen luetteloon. Tämän luettelon sivustot välttävät kaikki estoasetukset.

👉 Tarkennustila
Tarkennustilan ajastintoiminnon avulla voit hallita aikatauluasi Pomodoro-tekniikan ajastimen avulla. Jaa tehtäväsi väliajoiksi, jonka jälkeen pidä lyhyt tauko. 'Focus Mode' -toiminnolla voit asettaa ajat, jolloin verkkosivustot poistetaan käytöstä ja milloin selata vapaasti - tahdonvoimaa ei tarvita.

👉 Ajanhallinta
Näytä kuinka monta työjaksoa suoritit istunnon aikana. Pystyt suorittamaan kaikki tehtäväsi ja voit silti selata suosikkisivustojasi ja -sovelluksiasi välissä.

👉 Salasanasuojaus
Jos aloitat tarkennustilan, voit pysäyttää sen valitsemallasi salasanalla, mikä tekee siitä hieman vaikeampaa lykätä. Voit myös suojata asetussivun salasanalla, jotta et poista sivustoja helposti luettelosta.

👉 Pysäyttämätön tarkennustila
Valitse vaihtoehto, jolla haluat piilottaa keskeytys- ja pysäytyspainikkeet laajennuksen asetuksista. Etkä voi lopettaa sivustojen estämistä ennen kuin estoaika umpeutuu.

👉 Hauska estetty sivu
Näet nyt hauskoja kuvia, jos yrität päästä estetylle sivustolle. Voit tehdä tämän ottamalla tämän vaihtoehdon käyttöön sivuston estoasetuksissa. Et silti pääse sisään estetylle sivustolle, mutta ehkä hauska kuva saa sinut hymyilemään :))

long.fr:
Si vous voulez un peu de temps pour naviguer en ligne mais que vous espérez éviter une spirale Internet à part entière, le bloqueur de site pourrait être parfait pour vous.

Fixez une limite de temps pour les sites distrayants. Lorsque vous atteignez la limite, un bloc se met en place. Cela signifie que vous pouvez toujours vérifier votre flux de temps en temps, mais pas trop longtemps ni trop souvent.

Bloqueur de site conçu pour vous aider à rester concentré sur vos études, votre apprentissage et le travail qui compte. Bloque tous les sites Web qui vous font perdre du temps pour vous garder productif et loin de toutes les distractions qu'Internet a à offrir.

Pour utiliser Bloquer le site, définissez simplement un mot de passe, décidez à quels sites Web vous souhaitez accéder et laissez le bloqueur de site bloquer le reste. Si vous souhaitez visiter un site que vous avez bloqué, entrez simplement votre mot de passe et décidez combien de temps vous souhaitez rester sur le site bloqué.

Si vous êtes un parent, vous pouvez définir le mot de passe pour l'enfant. Ou, si vous souhaitez l'utiliser pour vous-même, demandez à un ami ou à un partenaire de le configurer pour vous aider à vous engager.

Et voila ! Vous disposez maintenant d'un ensemble de garde-fous Internet qui vous aident à rester productif et concentré sur vos tâches, que vous étudiiez, appreniez à distance ou ayez besoin d'un coup de pouce supplémentaire pour vous contrôler pour terminer un projet.

⭐️Caractéristiques⭐️

👉 Bloquer les sites, y compris ses sous-domaines
Supprimez tous les sites Web distrayants et nuisibles de votre vie en les bloquant pour vous pendant que vous devez rester concentré et productif.

👉 Liste blanche
Ajoutez des exceptions à la liste des sites Web bloqués. Les sites de cette liste évitent tous les paramètres de blocage.

👉 Mode de mise au point
La fonction de minuterie du mode de mise au point vous permet de contrôler votre emploi du temps via la minuterie de la technique Pomodoro. Décomposez vos tâches en intervalles suivis d'une courte pause. Avec le « Mode Focus », vous pouvez définir des moments où désactiver les sites Web et quand naviguer librement - aucune volonté n'est nécessaire.

👉 Gestion du temps
Indiquez combien de cycles de travail vous avez effectués au cours d'une session. Vous pourrez accomplir toutes vos tâches et avoir encore le temps de parcourir vos sites et applications préférés entre les deux.

👉 Protection par mot de passe
Si vous démarrez le mode de mise au point, vous pouvez l'arrêter avec un mot de passe de votre choix, ce qui rend un peu plus difficile la procrastination. Vous pouvez également protéger par mot de passe la page d'options pour vous empêcher de supprimer facilement des sites de votre liste.

👉 Mode de mise au point imparable
Sélectionnez l'option pour masquer les boutons de pause et d'arrêt dans les paramètres de l'extension. Et vous ne pourrez pas arrêter de bloquer des sites tant que le temps de blocage n'aura pas expiré.

👉 Page bloquée amusante
Vous verrez maintenant des images amusantes si vous essayez d'accéder à un site bloqué. Pour ce faire, vous devez activer cette option dans les paramètres de blocage de sites. Vous ne pourrez toujours pas accéder au site bloqué, mais peut-être qu'une image amusante vous fera sourire :))

Block Site est l'un des meilleurs outils de productivité disponibles pour aider les gens à moins tergiverser, à devenir plus productifs et à atteindre leurs objectifs de vie. Vous n'aurez plus jamais à vous soucier de savoir comment rester concentré au travail. Alors qu'est-ce que tu attends? Téléchargez maintenant et commencez à prendre le contrôle de votre temps... dès aujourd'hui !

*Note*
Pour bloquer les sites en mode incognito, vous devez cocher la case "Autoriser l'exécution en mode incognito" sur la page chrome://extensions.
long.hr:
If you want some time to browse online but hope to avoid a full-blown internet spiral, site blocker might be perfect for you. 
 
Set a time limit for distracting sites. When you reach the limit, a block goes into place. That means you still get to check your feed now and then, just not for too long or too often. 

Site blocker designed to help you stay focused on your studying, learning, and the work that matters. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet has to offer.

To use Block site, simply set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let site blocker to block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, just enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site.

If you’re a parent, you can set the password for child. Or, if you’d like to use it for yourself, have a friend or partner set it for you to help you commit.

And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you’re studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost self-control to finish a project.

⭐️Features⭐️

👉 Block sites including its subdomains
Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive.

👉 White list
Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

👉 Focus Mode
The focus mode timer feature enables you to control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your tasks into intervals followed by a short break. With ‘Focus Mode’ you can set times when to disable websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary. 

👉 Time Management
Show how many work cycles you completed during a session. You’ll be able to get all your tasks done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

👉 Password Protection
If you strart focus mode you can stop it with a passcode of your choosing, making it that bit harder to procrastinate. You can also password protect the options page to keep you from easily removing sites from your list.

👉 Unstoppable Focus Mode
Select the option to hide the pause and stop buttons in the extension settings. And you won't be able to stop blocking sites until the block time expires.

👉 Funny Blocked Page
You will now see funny images if you are trying to enter a blocked site. To do this, you need to enable this option in the site blocking settings. You will still not be able to enter the blocked site, but perhaps a funny picture will make you smile :))

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You’ll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

*Note*
To block sites in incognito mode you need to activate 'Allow run in incognito mode' checkbox  in chrome://extensions page.

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code. 
This app can also be used for parental control.

Features: 
Easy to use; 
The settings page is protected by a PIN code; 
A four-digit numeric code is used as a password for blocked websites;
Block sites in different ways depending on the day of the week and time.

Our app will simplify your life where it is possible and will protect you where it is really necessary!

A customizable, password-protected website blocker and redirector.
***
Block Site is now on the safer manifest v2. Please report the compatibility bugs you are experiencing. You can export the current rules to a JSON file and send it to me to investigate.
***

This extension will block access to websites of your choosing. A master password controls all customization options, as well as access to any blocked site. It's also possible to redirect navigation from one specific website to another. 


Features:
1. Block unwanted domains. 
2. Prevent access to a range of websites using wildcard matching or regular expression matching.
3. Reverse mode allows access to only some hostnames and blocks access to all others. 
4. Custom redirection; you can redirect a single blocked hostname to a new destination. 
5. Display a custom message on blocked pages.
6. Time and date-based blocking. Only block access to the websites at specified times and dates. This feature can be configured per hostname. 
7. Protect data leakage. This extension prevents certain hostnames from gathering network activity from your computer since blocking occurs before any network request is emitted to the server.
8. Auto-closes blocked tabs after some time.
10. Closes annoying pop-ups as soon as the opening request is received.
11. Pause and resume blocking from the right-click context menu of the toolbar button.
12. Support overwriting configurations by managed storage
13. Block cached page load with service worker
14. Block dynamic page change with history push method

Easily block websites of your choice!
Block Site is a browser addon to help you block desired websites. To operate, simply right-click on any webpage and then click on the "Block this website" context-menu item. The website will be added to the block list. Please note, the whole domain will be added to the block list, not just a URL. To change this list, open the options page, and remove the desired item.

For any blocked domain, you can add a redirect URL in the options page. So instead of blocking a page, the website will be redirected to the desired URL. There is also an option to block desired iframes. To do so, please add the URL (for the iframe) in the designated area on the options page.

Protect your time and experience by blocking waste websites.
Block unwanted or malicious web sites permanently or on a schedule. Save your time and protect against visiting unwanted web resources.

Block Site hides unwanted websites from you and protects your children from visiting them.

Configure the application to block domains permanently or on a schedule. 
Choose working days and hours when you do not want to visit any domain or working days and hours for all blocked domains.

Block Site is an advanced application for blocking inappropriate content. Useful features of the application:
- Blocking sites for one or more domain names
- Blocking sites by keywords
- Setting a schedule for blocking content
- Create a white list of domains

Try our software now. Its 100% free to use.

Block access to any site on your device
Save your time, protect yourself and improve your browsing experience with absolutely free site blocker. This extension allows you to block certain websites. It pretty useful if you want to protect your children or just if you want to shield yourself from inappropriate content. Block website you want just in a few clicks. Site blocker may also come in handy if you don`t want to be annoyed by a certain website. In that case you just block site and forget about it. The extension is a real productivity tool that denies access to websites you don`t want to see.
Surf the internet safely!
Block website and keep working on your main tasks without being distracted. Click on the extension icon in the right upper corner of the chrome and open the app. Then you just paste the website address into the corresponding field and block site. You can also instantly use the url from the current chrome tab. Removing a website from the list is also pretty easy – one click and done. This new site blocker extension is pretty simple but pretty useful app. Focus on what matters most and don`t get distracted. This extension is going to help you increasing your productivity at workplace. Easy to install, easy to use and absolutely free extension specially for you!
long.it:
Se vuoi un po' di tempo per navigare online ma speri di evitare una vera e propria spirale Internet, il blocco dei siti potrebbe essere perfetto per te.

Imposta un limite di tempo per i siti che distraggono. Quando raggiungi il limite, un blocco va a posto. Ciò significa che puoi ancora controllare il tuo feed di tanto in tanto, ma non troppo a lungo o troppo spesso.

Blocco del sito progettato per aiutarti a rimanere concentrato sullo studio, l'apprendimento e il lavoro che conta. Blocca tutti i siti Web di time-westing per mantenerti produttivo e lontano da tutte le distrazioni che Internet ha da offrire.

Per utilizzare Blocca sito, è sufficiente impostare una password, decidere a quali siti Web si desidera accedere e consentire a Site Blocker di bloccare il resto. Se vuoi visitare un sito che hai bloccato, inserisci la tua password e decidi per quanto tempo vuoi rimanere sul sito bloccato.

Se sei un genitore, puoi impostare la password per il bambino. Oppure, se desideri usarlo per te stesso, chiedi a un amico o un partner di impostarlo per aiutarti a impegnarti.

E voilà! Ora disponi di una serie di guardrail Internet che ti aiutano a rimanere produttivo e concentrato sia che tu stia studiando, imparando a distanza o hai bisogno di un ulteriore potenziamento dell'autocontrollo per completare un progetto.

⭐️Caratteristiche⭐️

👉 Blocca i siti inclusi i relativi sottodomini
Rimuovi dalla tua vita tutti i siti Web che distraggono e dannosi bloccandoli per te mentre devi rimanere concentrato e produttivo.

👉 Lista bianca
Aggiungi eccezioni all'elenco dei siti Web bloccati. I siti di questo elenco evitano tutte le impostazioni di blocco.

👉 Modalità messa a fuoco
La funzione del timer della modalità di messa a fuoco ti consente di controllare il tuo programma tramite il timer della tecnica del pomodoro. Suddividi le tue attività in intervalli seguiti da una breve pausa. Con la "Modalità messa a fuoco" puoi impostare gli orari in cui disabilitare i siti Web e quando navigare liberamente, senza bisogno di forza di volontà.

👉Gestione del tempo
Mostra quanti cicli di lavoro hai completato durante una sessione. Sarai in grado di portare a termine tutte le tue attività e avrai ancora tempo per navigare tra i tuoi siti e app preferiti.

👉 Protezione con password
Se avvii la modalità focus puoi fermarla con un passcode a tua scelta, rendendo un po' più difficile procrastinare. Puoi anche proteggere con password la pagina delle opzioni per impedirti di rimuovere facilmente i siti dal tuo elenco.

👉 Modalità di messa a fuoco inarrestabile
Seleziona l'opzione per nascondere i pulsanti di pausa e interruzione nelle impostazioni dell'estensione. E non sarai in grado di interrompere il blocco dei siti fino alla scadenza del tempo di blocco.

👉 Pagina bloccata divertente
Ora vedrai immagini divertenti se stai tentando di entrare in un sito bloccato. Per fare ciò, è necessario abilitare questa opzione nelle impostazioni di blocco del sito. Non sarai ancora in grado di entrare nel sito bloccato, ma forse una foto divertente ti farà sorridere :))

Block Site è uno dei migliori strumenti di produttività disponibili per aiutare le persone a procrastinare meno, diventare più produttive e raggiungere i propri obiettivi di vita. Non dovrai mai più preoccuparti di come rimanere concentrato sul lavoro. Allora, cosa stai aspettando? Scarica ora e inizia a prendere il controllo del tuo tempo... oggi!

*Nota*
Per bloccare i siti in modalità di navigazione in incognito è necessario attivare la casella di controllo "Consenti esecuzione in modalità di navigazione in incognito" nella pagina chrome://extensions.
long.ja:
オンラインでブラウジングする時間が欲しいが、本格的なインターネット スパイラルを回避したい場合は、サイト ブロッカーが最適です。

気を散らすサイトの時間制限を設定します。 限界に達すると、ブロックが配置されます。 つまり、フィードをときどきチェックすることができますが、長すぎたり頻繁すぎたりすることはありません。

勉強、学習、重要な仕事に集中できるように設計されたサイト ブロッカー。 すべての西暦 Web サイトをブロックして、生産性を維持し、インターネットが提供するすべての気晴らしから遠ざけます。

ブロック サイトを使用するには、パスワードを設定し、アクセスする Web サイトを決定し、サイト ブロッカーに残りをブロックさせます。 ブロックしたサイトにアクセスしたい場合は、パスワードを入力するだけで、ブロックされたサイトにアクセスする期間を決定できます。

保護者の方は、お子様用のパスワードを設定できます。 または、自分で使用したい場合は、友人やパートナーに設定してもらい、コミットするのを手伝ってもらいます.

そして出来上がり！ 勉強中、リモート学習中、またはプロジェクトを完了するためにさらに自制心を高める必要がある場合でも、生産性を維持し、タスクに取り組むのに役立つ一連のインターネット ガードレールが用意されました。

⭐️特徴⭐️

👉 サブドメインを含むサイトをブロックする
集中力と生産性を維持する必要がある間、それらをブロックすることで、気を散らす有害な Web サイトをすべてあなたの生活から取り除きます。

👉 ホワイトリスト
ブロックされた Web サイトのリストに例外を追加します。 このリストのサイトは、すべてのブロック設定を回避します。

👉 フォーカスモード
フォーカス モード タイマー機能を使用すると、ポモドーロ テクニック タイマーを介してスケジュールを制御できます。 タスクをいくつかの間隔に分割してから、短い休憩をとります。 「フォーカス モード」を使用すると、ウェブサイトを無効にするタイミングと自由に閲覧するタイミングを設定できます。意志の力は必要ありません。

👉 時間管理
セッション中に完了した作業サイクルの数を表示します。 すべてのタスクを完了することができ、その合間にお気に入りのサイトやアプリを閲覧する時間もあります.

👉 パスワード保護
フォーカスモードを開始すると、選択したパスコードで停止できるため、先延ばしにするのが少し難しくなります. オプション ページをパスワードで保護して、リストからサイトを簡単に削除できないようにすることもできます。

👉 止まらないフォーカスモード
拡張機能の設定で一時停止ボタンと停止ボタンを非表示にするオプションを選択します。 また、ブロック時間が経過するまでサイトのブロックを停止することはできません。

👉 面白いブロックされたページ
ブロックされたサイトに入ろうとすると、面白い画像が表示されるようになりました。 これを行うには、サイトのブロック設定でこのオプションを有効にする必要があります。 ブロックされたサイトにアクセスすることはできませんが、面白い写真を見ると笑顔になるかもしれません :))

Block Site は、人々が先延ばしを減らし、生産性を高め、人生の目標を達成するのに役立つ最高の生産性向上ツールの 1 つです。 仕事に集中する方法について二度と心配する必要はありません。 何を求めている？ 今すぐダウンロードして、時間の管理を始めましょう...今日から!

*ノート*
シークレット モードでサイトをブロックするには、chrome://extensions ページで [シークレット モードでの実行を許可する] チェックボックスをオンにする必要があります。
